results.title: Ketanji Brown Jackson Becomes First Black Female Supreme Court Justice
results.abstract: Her confirmation comes as the newly expanded conservative majority moves to give states more control.

results.title: Seth Meyers Calls Out Fox News Hosts for Falling Speechless
results.abstract: Meyers said hosts couldn’t “settle on a coherent narrative the way they usually do,” as indicated by a long, awkward pause during a live broadcast about Cassidy Hutchinson’s testimony.

media.caption: “Oof. That’s like when you get in the car with your parents after they took you to a movie that had way more nudity than they were expecting,” Meyers said.

results.title: Fauci says he believes Paxlovid kept him out of the hospital, even though he tested positive again.
results.abstract: Dr. Anthony Fauci, President Biden’s top pandemic adviser, sought to discourage doubts about the antiviral drug Paxlovid following what appeared to be a “rebound” of Covid-19 after taking the pills.

media.caption: “I’m 81 years old, I was at risk for hospitalization and I didn’t even come close to being sick enough to be hospitalized,” Dr. Anthony S. Fauci, pictured earlier this month, said on Wednesday.

results.title: Ukraine drives Russian forces from Snake Island, a setback for Moscow.
results.abstract: The retreat came after sustained Ukrainian attacks, including with newly arrived Western weapons, made it impossible for Russian forces to hold the island.

media.caption: Smoke rose from vehicles and structures on Snake Island, off the Ukrainian coast in the Black Sea, after Russian forces withdrew on Thursday.

results.title: A Canine Companion So Nice It (Maybe) Evolved Twice
results.abstract: Two different ancient wolf populations contributed DNA to modern dogs, according to a new study.

media.caption: The researchers found that ancient wolves that lived in far-flung locations were highly genetically similar, even more closely related than wolf populations are today.
